attributes.action: answer why our sentencing policies are so mixed up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
rights to live in a safe society,
rights to fair employment rights,
rights to be treated fully innocent until guilty,not guilty until innoccent.rights to fight for the rights of united kingdom first just like the ammericans do.clampdown on wild spending by ceo's & management in public company such as NHS,Royalmail etc
